translated: The Mansion on the Plane of the Gods🔽The Divine Maiden’s Mansion
The Chapter about Cittalatā
The Divine Maiden’s Mansion of Sunidha
“With surpassing beauty,
like a star among the herbs.
What is the cause of your beauty?

analyzed: vaṇṇaḥ ca te sabbadisā pabhāsati iti
translated: and your beauty shines in all directions?”
The deity, pleased,
the result of that deed.
“They called me Sunidha,
a lay follower in Rājagaha.
I had faith and was endowed with virtue,
always delighting in sharing.
I delighted in the five training rules,
skilled in the noble truths.
I was a lay follower of the Buddha,
the famous Gotama.
Because of that, I have this beauty,

analyzed: vaṇṇaḥ ca me sabbadisā pabhāsati iti
translated: and my beauty shines in all directions.”
The Divine Maiden’s Mansion of Sunidha is the ninth.
